Spray mystical flames, cleansing surfaces.

If the flames contact an enemy, the flames remove Wet, Chilled, Frozen, and Invisible. Additionally, the flames will apply a stack of Scorch, and if the target has no Magic Armour, Necrofire is applied.

If the flames contact an ally, the flames will instead cleanse Necrofire, Burning, Frozen, Stunned, Charmed, and Petrified. Allies become Warm.
